data.title: Learn About Our Vision and Expertise
data.meta_description: Explore our company profile to discover our mission, values, and expertise. Contact us to partner with a trusted industry leader
data.meta_site_name: Premier Polyester Yarn Manufacturers in India | Top Yarn Suppliers
data.text:
An ISO 9001:2015 Certified Company, Sarla Performance Fibers Limited (formerly known as Sarla Polyester Limited) is a 100% EOU engaged in the manufacturing and export of polyester and nylon textured, twisted and dyed yarns, covered yarns, high tenacity yarns and sewing thread. Beginning as a manufacturer of commodity yarns, the company has successfully shifted its focus and established itself as a manufacturer of specialized and higher value added yarns. Our strength lies in customizing the product as per each individual customer’s requirements and specifications.

Visit Our Products for a range of our offerings.

Over the years SPFL has expanded its activities with the expansion and upgradation of existing facilities in India, as well as through the creation of new facilities overseas with the primary objective of establishing closeness to customers to provide quick and efficient services to them. With clients in all major countries across the globe & a presence in key international locations, SPFL has developed a strong customer base See Global Presence.

Today, the company is run by its promoters, Mr Madhusudhan Jhunjhunwala, the current Chairman and Mr. Krishna Jhunjhunwala, the Managing Director. The company’s head office is located in Mumbai, India and its manufacturing facilities are situated 160 km outside Mumbai in Silvassa and Vapi. See Manufacturing Facilities.

A close-knit family-run business, with a professional approach in all its business endeavours enhanced with a long-standing market presence and promoter expertise, SPFL enjoys the promise of credibility, sustainability and growth.

Mr. Parantap Dave is a Chartered Accountant with 25+ years of consulting experience. Having deep knowledge and understanding on Corporate Advisory, Equity investment, securing funds both in form of Venture Capital/ Private Equity and Public Equity, M&A services, investment propositions, pre-investment appraisal and post-investment monitoring.

He also acts as an investment advisor and advises both investors and investees on transactions.

Mr. Dave continues to guide fast growing companies by being their Board Member, his association with SPFL continues to immensely benefit the Company

Mr. Jhamvar followed his B.E (Chem) with an MS (MIS) & MBA from the USA. He has been associated with various organisations in USA handling positions of Sr. Process Engineer, Financial Analyst, etc. for over 5 Years. Currently, Mr. Jhamvar is an Executive Director in Subhash Chemical Industries Pvt. Ltd. which is a privately owned specialty chemicals manufacturing Company based in Pune. He is also associated with Suttatti Enterprises Ltd and Affordable Robotics & Automation Ltd in the capacity of an Independent Director. His grasp on technical knowledge and a uniquely powerful combination of managerial talent and technical expertise shall be a great asset to the Company.
